title: Apricot flapjack tart
ingredients: ['1 quantity Orange sweet shortcrust pastry (see our separate recipe on this site), chilled for 30 minutes', 'Apricot filling', '500g (1 lb 2 oz) fresh ripe apricots, stoned and quartered', '3 tbsp orange juice', '½ tsp ground mixed spice', '1 tbsp clear honey', 'Flapjack topping', '45 g (1½ oz) porridge oats', '15 g (½ oz) sultanas', '15 g (½ oz) hazelnuts, chopped', '1 tbsp sunflower seeds', '1 tsp sesame seeds', '1 tbsp clear honey', '1 tbsp fresh orange juice']
